title: The 4-Ingredient Cherry Dish That Works for Breakfast *and* Dessert
full_text:

1
pint
sweet cherries
, halved and pitted
3
tablespoons

)
honey
2

Kosher salt
and freshly ground black pepper
2

Flaky salt
, such as Maldon (optional)
Directions
In a small bowl, toss together cherries, honey, and vinegar. Season with salt and a generous grating of pepper.
Spoon ricotta cheese into bowls (alternatively, spread it on toasted bread). Top with cherries and the macerating liquid, crushed almonds, and mint leaves. Sprinkle with flaky salt, if using, and serve.
Serious Eats / Vicky Wasik
Notes
It's important to seek out
high-quality fresh ricotta cheese
, since the mass-market brands usually found at supermarkets won't perform well in this simple recipe.
If you don't have Marcona almonds, substitute an equal quantity of macadamia nuts.
